title: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair

preview.html: In this article from gptafser.com/, we present different meanings of the vision in all cases and learn the opinion of some of its interpreters. Interpretation of the vision of combing hair in a dream for one girl. The connotations of this vision in an unmarried girl’s dream means her goodness and high morals. Or that someone will propose to her and she will marry him soon if God willing. He was watching her combing her hair and the comb was iron. She would face problems that would hinder her ability to achieve her dreams. However, I could see her combing her hair with difficulty, and her hair was long. Situations would happen to her that would make her unable to implement matters related to her future. Combing the girl’s sleep and lice It comes out of her hair. Evidence of the presence of enemies around her plots, and God knows best. Combing her hair and it was very long will succeed in her life after a while. Using a hair dryer in a dream of one person for her hair, she will hear bad news. It caused her heartache and sadness for her future, and God knows best. An unmarried girl She dreams that her fiancé is combing her hair with an iron comb. This means that she has been betrayed by her fiancé. Seeing her combing her hair with a plastic comb will be a new friendship. The plastic comb in one dream, marriage and a close relationship. If she studies the plastic comb, this indicates her success in her studies. A gold comb In the dream of an unmarried woman, it means a high aristocratic position. Or a change in their financial circumstances for the better, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hairdressing. Interpretation of seeing hair combed in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself in a dream combing her hair with a wooden comb. You will be blessed with a new pregnancy that you will enjoy, God willing. God. If a married woman combs her hair with a golden comb, may God bless her with abundant offspring. A married woman who uses an iron comb in a dream means that she will fall into worries and troubles. And if she sees in a dream her husband combing her hair, then he is cheating on her with another woman. Even though she combed Her hair is with a silver comb. She will enjoy a stable life and a bright future with her husband and family. Seeing her in a dream combing her hair with a dead man’s comb is evidence of the collapse of worry and anxiety that she suffers from, God willing. Combing hair in a dream for a married woman means her rising to high positions. It means enjoying marital bliss and comfort. Mind, God willing. If her husband gives her a comb in a dream, she will get pregnant soon. And if he gives her a silver comb, she will have a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man combing his curly hair shows that he is worried about something. Combing hair in a dream The man and his appearance are completely changed. Positive changes in his life mean a complete change. Or that he has achieved a prominent position in his work, God willing. Seeing a man in a dream that his hair is long is evidence of his slow decisions. Combing a man’s hair in a dream with his fingers is evidence of his communication with those close to him. Seeing A man whose hair has turned gray. His mind will govern his life decisions. A man combs his hair with an iron comb because he is a useful and just man. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about washing hair. The meaning of seeing combing hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing herself pregnant in a dream while combing her hair.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a calm and clear sea in detail

preview.html: Through this article, you can read in detail the interpretation of a dream about a calm, clear sea, as the sea represents one of the most important and picturesque natural features that provides comfort, relaxation, and tranquility by seeing it. In the world of dreams there are visions that indicate goodness and living, because the sea is one of God’s most beautiful blessings. But this depends on several circumstances, the most important of which is the state of the waves. In their calm state, it indicates a different meaning than the meaning of seeing crashing waves. In general, visions carry connotations that indicate happy or sad events or reflect the psychological state of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a calm and clear sea. Seeing a calm and clear sea indicates The state of psychological calm that the dreamer enjoys, and the comfort and reassurance that overwhelms him. If the married dreamer sees this vision in a dream, then this vision expresses the state of stability of marital life and the happiness that he enjoys with his wife and children. As for the unmarried person, this vision is a promising vision for him of goodness and happiness. It indicates marriage to a good girl with good morals. If the dreamer sees that he is drowning in the sea and cannot survive, then this vision is abhorrent and indicates the emergence of major problems in the dreamer’s life that he cannot face. As for the meaning of this vision for the sick dreamer, this vision is good news for recovery from illness. Illness, and God knows best. One of the indications of seeing a calm and clear sea is that it indicates kindness and an abundance of the color blue, in addition to maintaining a prestigious position. As for bathing in the sea, this vision indicates repentance and stopping forbidden things. Seeing a calm sea in a single woman’s dream. This vision for an unmarried girl indicates... Her relationship with a young man with high morals. For an unmarried girl, this vision represents the news of the end of worry and sadness and the end of the problems she suffers from. One of the indications of seeing a calm and clear sea is that it also represents achieving success and excellence and the opportunity to travel abroad. Interpretation of a calm sea in a dream for a married woman: The meaning of this vision for a married woman is that it is one of the good dreams that indicate goodness, living and happiness, and an indication of the birth of righteous children. The vision of swimming in the sea symbolizes her desire to achieve the goals that she seeks, and as for bathing in it, it shows repentance from sins and disobedience. In the event that He saw her drowning in sea water, then this vision indicates the crises that he is actually going through. But if she sees that she is drinking from sea water, then this vision represents a reflection of the stability of the marital life that she enjoys, and it also represents good news for her that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream A calm and clear sea for a pregnant woman. The meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman is ease of childbirth, and if she sees herself drinking sea water, this vision means goodness and food, and is represented by a large amount of money. For a pregnant woman, this vision indicates the fulfillment of desires, and it also expresses the suffering that she is going through A pregnant woman. Seeing bathing in sea water in a dream symbolizes her efforts to preserve the health of her fetus, and God knows best. We have presented it to you.

title: Cut off the head of a snake in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a severed snake head in a dream for an unmarried girl: When an unmarried girl sees a severed snake head in a dream, this dream deserves praise and carries good news of achieving what she wants in life, God willing. As for seeing a snake, this dream does not deserve praise, as it shows a state of sadness that comes Because of problems in his emotional life. The fact that the girl cut off the head of the snake indicates that her condition will change from sadness to joy, God willing. Perhaps this dream is a sign that God will reveal to him the lie of the person he loves and show her the truth. And God knows best. The white snake in a dream of an engaged girl cutting off its head is evidence of problems with her fiancé. God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a snake bite in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing the head of a snake cut off in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is cutting off the head of a snake in a dream. Evidence that she A strong woman who has the patience and endurance to face everything she faces in life. This vision is a praiseworthy vision because it is considered good news for getting rid of his enemy. Cutting off the head of a snake in a dream symbolizes that this woman will get rid of those who hold her hatred. She will also feel happy and provide him with God’s blessing. The snake in a married woman’s dream is cut off and her head is cut off. This dream indicates the possibility that she and her husband will fall into financial problems. But he will stand by his side until he passes this test for good, and he must ask for help, supplication, and forgiveness from God. Interpretation of seeing a severed snake’s head in a dream for a man and its meaningIf one sees himself He uses sticks or other objects to cut off the head of a snake, as this is good news that his marriage and livelihood are near, God willing. When a man sees that the head of a snake lying on his pillow is cut off, this indicates that his wife is approaching and that knowledge is with God only. If a person earns money in ways that are not permissible, He saw in a dream that he was cutting off the head of a snake. The sign of this is that God will direct and move away from this path, and he will make money from legal matters. And God knows best. This dream could be a warning to the person that those close to him are losing machinations and he should always pray to God for salvation and he will save him by God’s command. Or perhaps he will help someone from harm. Eating the head of a snake after cutting it off in a man’s dream is a sign that the enemy It provides him with a benefit. The man who cuts off the head of a snake while walking in public places symbolizes the possibility of war and victory, God willing. This dream indicates that this person will be victorious over his enemies. The snake in a dream is a symbol of the enemy, and God knows best. But if he gets up and cuts off the head of the snake three times This indicates the possibility of three divorces for his wife. Collecting snakes in a dream indicates that he will deceive his enemies or deceive them, God willing. Burying the snake after cutting off its head indicates that the person will submit to allowing the enemies. Or perhaps doubt in him will disappear, and this vision symbolizes his ability to confront The difficult things in his life, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on the leg by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing a severed snake head in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation. A snake in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of

title: I dreamed that I greeted my deceased grandmother in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I received my deceased grandmother in a dream. The dreamer asks about the meanings of his dream according to interpretation scholars, so we present in the following lines I dreamed that I received my deceased grandmother in a dream. I dreamed that I received my deceased grandmother in a dream. I dreamed that I received my deceased grandmother in a dream. It may be a sign of travel, but it faces some problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees peace in his dead grandmother in a dream, this may be evidence of a journey, but with some problems and difficulties, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a single girl sees peace in her dead grandmother in a dream It may be a sign of good deeds, but it faces some problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my grandmother crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my grandmother crying in a dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing, as seeing a grandmother crying can indicate a strong relationship with the grandmother, and God knows best. When you see a grandmother Crying in a dream could be a sign of joy, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her grandmother crying without a sound in a dream, this may indicate her need for care and help, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dreamed that my dead grandmother was calling me in a dream. I dreamed of my dead grandmother praying for me in a dream, a supplication The dead can bring goodness to the living, and God knows the unseen. When you see a supplication for the living from among the dead, it can lead to relief from problems and worries, God willing. If the dreamer sees a supplication from the dead, it may be a sign of peace of mind, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the supplication from the dead, it may give him relief. Of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother wearing gold in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother wearing gold in a dream. Wearing gold can represent good or bad. If a man sees himself wearing gold in a dream, this may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. As for if a married woman sees herself in Dreaming about her wearing gold, this may be evidence of goodness and living, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream wearing gold, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my grandmother wearing white in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother wearing white clothes in a dream. . Wearing white indicates goodness, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself in a dream wearing white, this may indicate good things, God willing. If a young man sees himself wearing white, this indicates goodness for his family, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a white dress, this may lead to goodness. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a sad grandmother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sad grandmother in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a grandmother angry can lead to non-adherence to customs, and God knows the unseen, as it may express a violation of customs and traditions, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees his grandmother angry In a dream, this may be a sign of a problem in the family, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing a bag of coffee in a dream

preview.html: How many of us see coffee bags in a dream, but Ibn Sirin is here in his interpretation. He says that the vision indicates overcoming crises and solving problems with the grace of God. When you see that you open a coffee bag, it indicates unloved or bad visions. It indicates a difficult period in life accompanied by With tension, in addition to many problems and fears. And if you see buying a bag of coffee in a dream, here it shows the completion of the supplication and its response from God Almighty and the achievement of what you want. And when you see coffee thrown on the ground, this indicates that he will suffer a great financial loss with all the money he has. But if it exceeds Land, they show a small profit and won. Seeing an exchange of a bag of coffee with another person indicates an exchange of love between them. It shows the strength of the relationship and their interaction with each other. Interpretation of seeing a bag of coffee in a dream for a single woman When she sees a bag of coffee in a dream, this indicates that the girl has strength, activity, and vitality Then her love and dedication to her work followed. But when a girl sees a stranger offering her coffee, this indicates a lot of anxiety, sadness, and distress. But soon, and in a short time, this experience and period will disappear. Interpretation of a dream about coffee for a married woman I mean seeing coffee in a dream for a married woman who She prepares her for the husband because of her love for those around her, and because she has a lot of tenderness, love and affection. Then it indicates achievement in the husband’s work. When you see a woman drinking coffee, this indicates that she is thinking carefully about what is happening around her in life and some problems. Interpretation of seeing a bag of ground coffee in A dream for a pregnant woman. I mean, see ground coffee. In a dream, a pregnant woman expects to give birth to a male child, as it is fair to his parents. Ground coffee indicates the earliest date of birth, and that will be easy for her, and God Almighty. Symbol of coffee in a dream. Seeing coffee in a dream is considered excessive thinking, as well as unstable situations. In life. Then, in his mood swings, he also shows battles with himself all the time. Seeing coffee in a dream indicates a state of disagreement taking place between the mind in contemplating what is going on around it in social matters, and God knows best. Seeing coffee in a dream indicates a feeling of disappointment. Hope and failure. Towards something after that. Drinking coffee indicates thinking and focusing on solving problems. Seeing coffee in a dream indicates research into the past and what happened in it, and the memories that the mind carries. When he sees coffee, it indicates some dealings and relationships in the field of work and benefiting from them. And what is related to his interest in first appreciation. I mean seeing coffee gives pleasure to the person seeing the spirit of creativity and transporting him to a higher position he deserves in the field of work or the field of studying life. Seeing coffee means competition and battles that require some flexibility. Coffee indicates a change in life to a better state of enjoyment. With activity and work. Pouring coffee in a dream When you see pouring coffee, this indicates in the dream that you are spending money, either here for the family or for someone in need, among the poor and needy. Seeing and smelling the smell of coffee in a dream

Pouring coffee in a dream When you see pouring coffee, this indicates in the dream that you are spending money, either here for the family or for someone in need, among the poor and needy. Seeing and smelling the smell of coffee in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing an envelope in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation and various other interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the occasion in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation and various other interpretations, the interpretation of the dream can indicate a group of new and different ideas that can promote a new idea in a person’s life or herald a certain event that will occur in the life of the Messenger, and a group of interpretations has been created by scholars. Among them are Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, and during our next article we will discuss with you the interpretation of seeing the occasion in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an envelope in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an envelope in a dream expresses that the dreamer will receive happy and joyful news during the coming days in the dreamer’s life. This vision also indicates that many positive changes will occur in the dreamer’s life, which will enable him to achieve his goals and aspirations in life. Seeing the occasion may symbolize the dreamer’s protection from some crises and bad things that he may face in the coming days, were it not for God’s grace and salvation from difficulties and crises. Whoever is single and proposes to a girl in a dream and sees a white envelope in his dream, then his vision indicates that the bride’s family will accept their daughter’s marriage to him and marry him. The best way, God willing. Seeing a man opening an envelope in his dream when he has arrived at his home is one of the unfortunate visions that may take the form of bad news that negatively affects the fortuneteller’s life, but it will pass quickly and will not pass. A great inconvenience. Seeing an empty letter envelope in a dream indicates the fulfillment of some things in the fortuneteller’s life that he wanted very much, but did not expect to happen soon. Seeing empty envelopes in general foretells to the dreamer that many positive and happy things will happen in the coming days of his life. While Seeing God tearing up envelopes in a dream indicates the cancellation of an important matter that the fortuneteller has been attending to for a long time, and God knows best. Whoever saw in his dream a brown envelope lying on the ground, his vision was a sign that he found someone he had been trying to meet for a while, and this vision may foretell the return of the absent person. Or the return of the absent person. The traveler to his state. His home and family after many years of absence and separation. Whoever sees in his dream that he puts something in an envelope and closes it tightly and does not want to open it, then seeing the seal on the envelope shows something that the dreamer knows well but does not want to hear and turns away from. . But in any case, he will be exposed to it, which will cause him some sadness and pain. Seeing the envelope and reading it in a dream is one of the good visions that give the dreamer good news that he will hear happy news and positive changes in his life. But opening the envelope shows that the fortuneteller will be affected by some negative things, but it will not cause him any harm. A lot of crises. Seeing a torn or torn envelope being changed in a dream means that you are canceling some arrangements for recent social events such as weddings or engagements. And if you see in your dream that another person opens an envelope for you, then this vision is a sign that the family will talk about a happy topic It relates to you. And whoever sees in his dream that he is putting something in an envelope in a dream, he will soon begin a long journey, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an envelope containing money in a dream for

If you want to know what the interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend singing in a dream brings, we present what it carries, all of this and much more..Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend singing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend singing in a dream, perhaps expressing happiness, by God. The most knowledgeable: If the dreamer sees himself singing with a beautiful voice in a dream, this may indicate happiness, and God knows the unseen, while the song and all the applause can indicate ambition, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees himself singing loudly in a dream, this may be a sign of failure, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of my mother singing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my mother singing in a dream can express happiness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her mother singing, this may be a sign that she will achieve what her mother wants, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees her mother singing in a dream, this may symbolize happiness. And God knows all that is not seen. If a divorced woman sees her mother singing in a dream, this may mean achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my son singing in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my son singing in a dream. To see a son singing happily can indicate your strong relationship with the mother, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If A married woman saw her son singing happily, it may be because of her strong relationship with the son, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself singing with a bad voice in a dream, this may lead to loss, and God knows the unseen. While singing with a beautiful voice in a dream could mean happiness, and God has All knowledge: Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream. Perhaps dancing expresses the mother’s illness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the mother dancing in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. For a married woman, when she sees her mother dancing, it may be An indication of illness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her mother dancing in a dream, this may lead to illness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a brother singing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a brother singing in a dream may carry a vision of singing with a beautiful voice, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone singing with a beautiful voice, it may lead to illness, and God knows best. This will lead to good things, God willing. When you see someone singing loudly in a dream, this could be a sign of bad things, and God knows the unseen. It could express failure, and God knows all that is unseen. Perhaps the dead singing in a bad voice leads to undesirable things, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, if the dreamer sees the dead singing in a beautiful voice, this may indicate profits for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dead singing in a beautiful voice in a dream, this may be a sign of trouble for the dreamer, and God He knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a sick person singing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sick person singing in a dream can indicate recovery, God willing. But if the dreamer sees someone singing loudly in a dream, this may be a sign of failure and death.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggs: Eggs are a dairy product that contains calcium, which is beneficial to the body and also has many benefits. The most important thing that commentators said about this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about eggs: The respected Nabulsi scholar believes that seeing boiled eggs in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and an abundance of goodness that comes to the dreamer. And in the event that the dreamer sees In a dream, he put the eggs under the hen and the little chickens came out of them, this indicates that he will soon have a good child. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream boiled eggs and places them in his hand, it symbolizes a good situation and rejection of problems and obstacles in his life. If a woman sees in a dream That the hen lays eggs, this indicates the nourishment of the child. Seeing a lot of eggs in a dream means that he has a lot of money and is afraid to spend it on useless matters. If a single man sees eggs in a dream, it promises him marriage, which will soon be with a girl who is suitable for him and will have A lot of good things. If a married man sees a lot of eggs in a dream, this indicates breastfeeding with children. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating raw eggs, this symbolizes the consumption of forbidden things or adultery, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirini, says the great scholar Ibn Sirin: Seeing eggs in a dream means very good and abundant nutrition that the dreamer will receive. If in a dream the dreamer sees eggs under the hen, it symbolizes the acquisition of ambitions and the achievement of what is desired. As for the dreamer who sees large eggs in a dream, this indicates the nourishment of offspring. Fair males. Since the dreamer sees eggs in a dream under the rooster and the hatchlings, this means that he has good morals and will be a teacher for generations. If the lady sees in a dream that she has given birth to eggs, this means that she will soon become pregnant and rebel when she grows up against his religion, and God knows best. As for the dreamer Whoever sees boiled eggs in a dream, this indicates the abundance of nutrition that he will soon gain. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a single woman in a dream indicates excellence in her academic or professional life and the brilliant success that she will achieve. In the event that the dreamer sees eggs in a dream, this means She has a good personality at work and in developing her life and work, which will benefit her. As for the dreamer who sees eggs in a dream inside his home, this indicates the constant preservation of her health and directs her attention to herself. Seeing a girl in a dream buying eggs indicates the date of her upcoming wedding and meeting a partner. Life. Seeing eggs in a dream shows the positive changes that will happen to her and she will rejoice with absolute happiness. The dreamer seeing broken eggs in a dream indicates that her wedding date is approaching and that she will become pregnant soon. What is the interpretation of a dream about white eggs for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees white eggs in In a dream, it means that she will soon achieve great success and great superiority. Seeing a dreamer with white boiled eggs in a dream indicates comfort and happiness that will knock on her door. As for the dreamer who sees white eggs in a dream,

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream?

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman? The world of dream interpretation is full of signs and connotations that carry different meanings that warn the dreamer of what will happen to him. The sleeper may see in his dream his father in a sick condition, and when he wakes up, he feels panic and fear of This vision causes him anxiety and confusion, so he resorts to interpretive scholars to explain what he saw in his dream. Interpretation scholars say that this vision varies according to the social status of the person who sees it, and also varies according to the condition of the father in the dream, and for this we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia. Interpretation of this vision in detail according to what interpretation scholars and jurists indicate. Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream while he is sick. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a father being sick in a dream indicates a very bad psychological state and that he is suffering from problems and fears. This vision may indicate the deterioration of the pioneer’s financial conditions. Interpretation of seeing a father being sick in a dream: If the sleeper sees his father in his dream and complains of illness, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the arrival of difficult problems in the dreamer’s life, and this vision may indicate the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness. Interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees her father In her dream, he was sick, and the girl continued to cry for her father. This is a good vision that portends the coming of goodness in her life. Crying in a dream symbolizes freedom from worries. Relief arrives. If an unmarried girl sees her sick father in her dream and embraces him, this is a sign that the dreamer needs someone to hold her and make her feel safe. Seeing a sick father in a dream complaining about his illness and the dreamer praying for him is one of the good visions that indicate to the dreamer that God will take all If an unmarried girl dreams while she is sleeping that her father is sick and he cried from the pain of illness and wiped his tears with her hand, then this is a vision that shows that the dreamer is always seeking to extend a hand. Help and assistance in this. Her family. Interpretation of seeing a sick father in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her sick father in her dream and complains of illness, this is a sign of the problems and anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from and the instability of her life. Seeing a sick father crying in a dream means that the dreamer’s father is in distress and wants to He stands by his side. The interpretation of seeing a father in a dream is bad for a pregnant woman. Seeing a sick father crying in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date is approaching. The interpretation of seeing a dead father who is sick. If the dreamer’s father has actually died and the dreamer sees in a dream that his father is sick, then this vision indicates that The father needs someone to pray for him and give alms on his behalf, and the dreamer must give the father alms. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his deceased father is sick with cancer, this is a vision that indicates that this father will not enjoy his life in the afterlife, and the dreamer should pray for him. This vision may indicate that However, this father died without paying him, and he must
